mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_BOARD (psnum, num, subject, content, bdtype, hitCount, ipaddr, ies, loca, loca_d, gender, age, person_c, reg_date, blind) VALUES (#{psnum}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{bdtype}, 0, #{ipaddr}, #{ies}, #{loca}, #{loca_d}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{person_c}, SYSDATE, 0)
